SA15dhknyayu:369_0: na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsāir hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca
SA15dhknyayu:369_1: sarvatra asattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣa-lakṣaṇaṃ vā. tad arthāpattyā
SA15dhknyayu:371: ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatā-ādayaḥ sādhana-doṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam. tena para-iṣṭa-artha-siddhi-pratibandhāt.
